text: On goh ki xoharat [dar kanori rud hamroh ʙo sanduqi tu] roh meraft va [ʙa kasone, ki turo az oʙ giriftand] guft: «Mexohed saxsero nisonaton diham, ki sarparastii uro ʙa uhda ʙigirad?» Pas, turo ʙa modarat ʙozgardonidem, to casmas [ʙa didorat] ravsan gardad va anduhgin naʙosad; va [ʙa'dho] tu saxse [qiʙti]-ro kusti va Mo az anduh [va mucozoti qatl] nacotat dodem va turo ʙorho ozmudem. Pas [az on] cand sol ʙajni mardumi Madjan ʙa sar ʙurdi; on goh, ej Muso, ʙar [tiʙqi] taqdiri [ilohi va dar zamoni muqarrar ʙa in co] omadi
